definition.name: Setup Vim
definition.description: Setup Vim or Neovim text editors on GitHub Actions
definition.author: rhysd <https://rhysd.github.io>

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Version of Vim or Neovim to install. Valid values are 'stable', 'nightly' or version tag such as 'v8.2.0126'. Note that this value must exactly match to a tag name when installing the specific version.

inputs.name: neovim
inputs.description: Setting to true will install Neovim.

inputs.name: configure-args
inputs.description: Arguments passed to ./configure execution when building Vim from source.

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Personal access token for GitHub API. It is used for calling GitHub API when Neovim asset is not found in stable releases and needs to fallback. You don't need to set this input since it is set automatically.

outputs.name: executable
outputs.description: Absolute file path to the installed executable.

outputs.name: vim-dir
outputs.description: Absolute file path to the $VIM directory of the installation. Please see `:help $VIM` for more details.
